ygData.subject: Worth it to practice 1h blunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: I didn t get a 1h blunt weapon (cracked staff) until I turned like level 10, but I didn t practice it much. I think my skill is (1). My piercing and 2h blunt
ygData.messageBody:
I didn't get a 1h blunt weapon (cracked staff) until I turned like level
10, but I didn't practice it much.
I think my skill is (1).

My piercing and 2h blunt are good though.

Should I try hard and increase it?
You can only increase mele skills on blues or above, right?

Thanks
Azboklin the enchanter
